article.Heading: Expect ad spends to increase particularly with GST benefits: Zee
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18, Mihir Modi, Chief Finance & Strategy Officer at Zee Entertainment spoke about the results and gave his outlook for the company.
article.Body:
Zee Entertainment posted a good set of earnings in Q1 with steady margin growth led by cost cutting measures and healthy advertising revenues.

In an interview to CNBC-TV18, Mihir Modi, Chief FinanceÂ & Strategy Officer at Zee Entertainment spoke about the results and gave his outlook for the company.

Saw pre-goods and services tax (GST) issues on inventory and distribution, said Modi.

"Underlying industry health is very good. I think the advertisers are very optimistic about their own profit and loss (P&L) given that GST will benefit a whole lot of them," he added.

He expects advertising spends to increase particularly with GST benefits.

He further said that Zee has invested in some new technology companies this year.

Keeping eyes open for acquisitions, added Modi.

Watch accompanying video for more details.
